author: Brian Lloyd
title: MovieNews | Watch: James Spader's dialogue from The US Office mashed with Age of Ultron is just...
text:
If anyone's watched The US Office and its later seasons, you'll recall how Steve Carrell's office manager was replaced by James Spader's intensely sexual CEO.
There was a real sense that James Spader just turned up on set, without a script, and started talking rather than it being a real character. In any case, Robert California was a highlight of The US Office's run and helped to launch James Spader back into our collective consciousness.
And, we'll admit, we're all the better for it because James Spader's just the best. The folks over at RedLetterMedia thought the same and decide to mash some of Robert California's nuggets of insight with Ultron to create something absolutely hilarious.
Take a look.
Via YouTube / RedLetterMedia
